link.description: Link to the main page of the opportunity

form_link.description: Link to the form page of the opportunity

short_description.description: The shortest possible description of the opportunity for placement on the general page with all other opportunities

description.description: Long and detailed description of the opportunity

provider.description: Name of the opportunity program organizer

logo.description: Link to a logo image file

advantages.description: Benefits of an opportunity (what experience you can gain, who you can meet, etc.)

target_audience.description: Who is the opportunity program intended for (medical professionals, IT specialists, etc.)

discipline.description: List of professional disciplines related to the opportunity

country.description: The country where the opportunity is realized

city.description: The city where the opportunity is realized

place.description: A list of specific places where the opportunity is realized

selection_stages.description: Stages of selection for the opportunity program (if any)

name.description: The name of this stage of selection

timespan.description: The period of this stage of selection

objectives.description: List of all tasks for this stage of selection

additional_sections.description: Additional subheadings that describe the opportunity and do not fit into the other points

content.description: Content of subheading in markdown format

tags.description: List of tags of the opportunity

form.description: Information about the opportunity application form and its fields

name.description: The name of the field from the HTML "name" attribute.

required.description: Flag indicating whether the field is required to be filled in

label.description: The field label displayed on the site

max_len.description: Field is valid if type is string. Maximum string length

min.description: Field is valid if type is number. Minimum value of a number

max.description: Field is valid if type is number. Maximum value of a number

choices.description: Field is valid if type is choice. List to choose from

max_size_byte.description: Field is valid if type is file. Maximum file size in bytes.

pattern.description: Field is valid if type is regex. Pattern of a regex
